item.description:
Event: Lilac Sunday is a festive day at the Arboretum, home to one of the North America’s premier Lilac collections. The event includes a tour of the lilacs, dance performances and picnicking. Bring your own picnic lunch or buy refreshments. For  directions   or more information on the Arboretum, please visit: www.arboretum.harvard.edu

Trip's Leader: Andrea (anissenbaum@lycos.com)

                                                      

Meet:  At 11 a.m. at the main   Arborway  Gate located at the Arnold Arboretum, 125 Arborway,  Jamaica Plain, Mass. 02130. There is limited parking on the side streets.  Public   transit: Take the Orange Line to Forest Hills and the Arboretum is across the street from the station.

RSVP: Required by May 11th. Andrea will provide the arrangements when you RSVP.

COST:$5  for non-members, plus the cost of food.
item.how_to_find_us: We are going to meet at the main Arborway Gate and send a message to Andrea for more details

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Take part in Lilac Sunday at the Arboretum
